column1: Baloch Nushki Football Club is a professional football club based in the city of Nushki
column2: Balochistan. It competes in Pakistan Premier League
column3: playing the current season after gaining promotion from 2014-15 Pakistan Football Federation League.

column1: Baloch Nushki played in the 2006–07 National Club League and won the tournament. They were promoted to 2007–08 Football Federation League. In the 2014-15 Football Federation League
column2: they lost to Pakistan Navy in the final. They were promoted to Pakistan Premier League.

column1: Baloch Nushki were the only club who started in National Club League and went to Pakistan Premier League. From tier 3 to tier 1.
